alert.note: Alert for Manua; Rose Atoll; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued December 26 at 6:08AM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS AFTERNOON... WHAT...Potential for Flash flooding remain as rainfall possible through this afternoon WHERE...All islands of American Samoa WHEN...through this afternoon IMPACTS...Heavy rainfall may cause ponding on the roadways and rapidly rising streams throughout the territory. ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The risk for landslides remains as grounds are already saturated. Nofo Va`ava`aia mo Tafega ma Lologa Ofisa o le Tau Pago Pago AS 7 Vaveao Aso Lua Tesema 26 2023 ...O LOO FA`AAUAU LE NOFO VA`AVA`AIA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA SE`IA OO I LE AOAULI NEI... MAFUAAGA...O lologa ma tafega e mafua mai i timuga mamafa. NOFOAGA...Motu uma o Amerika Samoa TAIMI...Se`ia oo i le aoauli nei AAFIAGA...O timuga mamafa e mafai ona lolovaia ai luga o auala tele. FA`AMATALAGA FA`AOPOOPO...O timuga mamafa ma le susu o le eleele e ono solo ai mauga ma eleele. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O le uiga o le nofo vaavaaia mo tafega ma lologa, o le ono faatupula`ia lea o le tetele o timuga, tafega ma lologa, fa`apea sologa mai i mauga po o eleelee, ona o uiga louloua o le tau. E tatau ona tapena ma faalogologo i le leitio mo tala o le tau, ae maise pe a iai se faailo mo se lapataiga mo tafega ma lologa.
info.instruction: A flood watch means that conditions may develop that lead to flash flooding. You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should flash flood warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Rose Atoll; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
